channel.title: The Bard [BD] / The Page [Unseen] (Social)
channel.description:
># [color=#0000FF]The Bard Blue Dragon Social[/color] >Passive(1): Close Walls, You'll be able to talk to a random player throughout the game, they will know you as The Bard/Page only, you'll know there number only (Even if you get converted you keep this passive) Day Ability(1): Song of Slumber, Prevent a player from speaking in any factional chats they may have. (2 Uses) Day Ability(2): Mix vote, Swap a players vote Results they will be unaware (2 Uses) Night Ability(1): Warenty, Prevent Feedback on two players only effects non Blue Dragons (Infinate) [Might change] Night Ability(2): Alert, Send Someone Feedback about somone else (2 Uses)
># [color=#8000BF] The Page Unseen Social [/color] >Passive(1): Close Walls, You'll be able to talk to a random player throughout the game, they will know you as The Bard/Page only. (Even if you get converted you keep this passive) Day Ability(1): Foggy Mind, always make a player belive that there results didn't work out, Investigatives will always see there target as good (3 Uses) Day Ability(2): Mix vote, Swap a players vote Results they will be unaware (2 Uses) Night Ability(1) Trick, Make a player visit themselevs Unkowningly, bypasses Occupy and Redirection Immunity. (Infinite) Night Ability(2): Slander, Send Someone Feedback about somone else, this will be false if the feedback was from a Investigative. (2 Uses)

I’ll drown people in suggested classes!

item.title: The Bard [BD] / The Page [Unseen] (Social)
item.dc:creator: Soulshade55r
item.description:
The Bard Blue Dragon Social

Passive(1): Close Walls, You’ll be able to talk to a random player throughout the game, they will know you as The Bard/Page only, you’ll know there number only (Even if you get converted you keep this passive)
Day Ability(1): Song of Slumber, Prevent a player from speaking in any factional chats they may have. (2 Uses)
Day Ability(2): Mix vote, Swap a players vote Results they will be unaware (2 Uses)
Night Ability(1): Warenty, Prevent Feedback on two players only effects non Blue Dragons (Infinate) [Might change]
Night Ability(2): Alert, Send Someone Feedback about somone else (2 Uses)

The Page Unseen Social

Passive(1): Close Walls, You’ll be able to talk to a random player throughout the game, they will know you as The Bard/Page only. (Even if you get converted you keep this passive)
Day Ability(1): Foggy Mind, always make a player belive that there results didn’t work out, Investigatives will always see there target as good (3 Uses)
Day Ability(2): Mix vote, Swap a players vote Results they will be unaware (2 Uses)
Night Ability(1) Trick, Make a player visit themselevs Unkowningly, bypasses Occupy and Redirection Immunity. (Infinite)
Night Ability(2): Slander, Send Someone Feedback about somone else, this will be false if the feedback was from a Investigative. (2 Uses)

Read full topic
